ygData.subject: re: message 1016 - History of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry this reply is so late, I ve been away from the club for too long. As usual, AllaKhazam s seems to have everything. I found a listing of items
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry this reply is so late, I've been away from
the club for too long. <br>As usual, AllaKhazam's
seems to have everything. I found a listing of items
concerning game lore and history at:
<a href=http://everquest.allakhazam.com/lore/Lore_List.html target=new>http://everquest.allakhazam.com/lore/Lore_List.html</a><br><br>Hope this helps ya.<br><br>Moradin
Soulforger<br>Reverend of Turmoil<br>Dwarven Paladin of 23
blessings<br>Tunare.<br><br>Boneseeker, I've managed to pick up just a couple languages,
but I'm always interested in learning more. I can
teach you gnomish to excellent if you still need it.
Look me up if you get a chance.
